name: Pizza Horror Game
description:
This is a submission for the Haunted PS1s Horrifying Halloween Gamejam of 2019.

The theme was a horrorgame in an low-rez PS1 style.

I thought to make a horror game about delivering pizzas because that's not something you often see.

This game is more a tech demo than a game because I kinda ran out of time, but that's fine since I learned a lot along the way!

I've also never delved into the horror genre before, so I thought it could be fun to try stepping out of my comfort zone!

Things to note:

I didn't program a good text-skipping system, so if you left-click while a dialogue is being printed it will skip that entire text onto the next one, so don't click if you like to read.

Do NOT press 'E'. Doing so softlocks the program until you restart it, I kinda put in a debug message that I forgot to remove afterwards (I know that you're going to press it anyways but hey there's no harm in tellin' ya).

The game is very unfinished so remember that when the lights go out, that's basically when the game ends, ALTHOUGH, some interactable objects DO get different dialogue popups.

If you get an error message about some crust shader or something, just restart the game until it works.

To play the game, extract the contents of the zip into a folder and then click the exe file!

Seeing as this game is highly unfinished, I'm planning to work more on it after the gamejam so that I can release a better version with all the originally planned content, (and trust me, there's a LOT of those).

But all in all, this was definitely a fun and educational experience!

So uh yeah! Hope ya enjoy this fun little test I put together and look forward for the enhanced version!
